name: Sharp Shooter (itch) (DarkLava)
description:
Welcome to Sharp Shooter!

Shoot the targets before they hit the ground. The gun has 6 bullets, you'll need to reload. Combo shots without missing for extra points. You have 3 lives.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse + Click - Aim and fire

R - Reload

Left / Right arrow keys - Change song 

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
